 2008-09282008-05-15,  ,  ,  ,  FIN
ActCustoms Tariff
PrecisOrder Amending the SCHEDULE to the CUSTOMS TARIFF, 2008-1 by removing the customs duties on a number of manufacturing inputs and also makes permanent the duty relief provided under tariff item No. 9931.00.00 for certain woven fabrics for use in the manufacture of upholstered furniture.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2008-0150 Publication Date: 2008-05-28
